content.rendered:
The FIFA put up for sale last Wednesday the 19th the tickets for him World Cup 2022 which will be held in Qatar between the next November 21 and December 18. Fans who wish can now make their Bookings through the website of the highest body in world football, prior registration.

Despite the fact that a quota of places has been reserved for more affordable prices for the Qatari citizens and for the migrant workers in that country, the bulk of the seats will go to foreign fans.

Localities range from about affordable 60.43 euros of the cheapest (usual price at LaLiga Satnander ticket offices), corresponding to the matches of the qualifying phase, up to the masks for the final, which reaches 1,414.46 euros. For this last match, the one that will decide the name of the champion team, the cheapest seat is sold at a rate of 531.93 euros each unit.

These are the location price bracketsby phases, of the championship:

Group stage, between 60.45 and 193.43 euros

round of 16, between 84.63 and 241.97 euros

Quarter finals, between 181.34 and 347.77 euros

semifinals, between 314.32 and 841.42 euros

match for him third and fourth place between 181.34 and 347.77 euros

Final, between 531.93 and 1,414.46 euros
